docs.title: Unified Measurement Ontology
docs.text:
A set of LinkML enumerations representing common units used in scientific research.

docs.title: About Unified Measurement Ontology
docs.text: A set of LinkML enumerations representing common units used in scientific research.

docs.title: Unified Measurement Ontology
docs.text:
A set of LinkML enumerations representing common units used in scientific research.

URI: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/UnifiedMeasurementOntology

Name: unified_measurement_ontology

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description NamedThing A generic grouping for any identifiable entity Person Represents a Person PersonCollection A holder for Person objects

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description age_in_years Number of years since birth birth_date Date on which a person is born description A human-readable description for a thing entries id A unique identifier for a thing name A human-readable name for a thing primary_email The main email address of a person vital_status living or dead status

docs.text: Enumeration Description PersonStatus

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Class: Person
docs.text:
Represents a Person

URI: unified_measurement_ontology:Person

 classDiagram
    class Person
    click Person href "../Person/"
      NamedThing <|-- Person
        click NamedThing href "../NamedThing/"

      Person : age_in_years

      Person : birth_date

      Person : description

      Person : id

      Person : name

      Person : primary_email

      Person : vital_status





        Person --> "0..1" PersonStatus : vital_status
        click PersonStatus href "../PersonStatus/"

    • Person

name: Person
description: Represents a Person
from_schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/UnifiedMeasurementOntology

- primary_email
- birth_date
- age_in_years
- vital_status

    name: primary_email
    pattern: ^\S+@[\S+\.]+\S+

docs.title: Class: PersonCollection
docs.text:
A holder for Person objects

    click PersonCollection href "../PersonCollection/"

        PersonCollection --> "*" Person : entries
        click Person href "../Person/"

docs.title: Enum: PersonStatus
docs.text: URI: unified_measurement_ontology:PersonStatus

docs.title: Permissible Values
docs.text: Value Meaning Description ALIVE PATO:0001421 the person is living DEAD PATO:0001422 the person is deceased UNKNOWN None the vital status is not known

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Description vital_status living or dead status

docs.title: Schema Source
docs.text: • from schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/UnifiedMeasurementOntology

docs.title: LinkML Source
docs.text:
name: PersonStatus
from_schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/UnifiedMeasurementOntology
rank: 1000
permissible_values:
  ALIVE:
    text: ALIVE
    description: the person is living
    meaning: PATO:0001421
  DEAD:
    text: DEAD
    description: the person is deceased
    meaning: PATO:0001422
  UNKNOWN:
    text: UNKNOWN
    description: the vital status is not known
    todos:
    - map this to an ontology
